learning.supervised

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.Classifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdaBoostM2, AKNN, ANHBNN, BoostableClassifier, CBWkNN, DWHFNN, DWKNN, FNN, HFNN, HIKNN, HIKNNNonDW, HwKNN, KNN, NHBNN, NWKNN, PKNN, RRKNN, RSLVQ

    public abstract class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValidateableInterface, java.io.Serializable, Citable
    This class implements the methods used for classifier training and testing.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • copyConfiguration

        public abstract ValidateableInterface copyConfiguration()
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method copies the initial classifier configuration, without copying the entire trained model. It essentially copies the parametrized classifier type.
        Specified by:
        copyConfiguration in interface ValidateableInterface
        Returns:
        ValidateableInterface that is the copy of the parametrized initial classifier configuration.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        currentIndexes - ArrayList of training data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int numClasses,
                           float[][] pointDistances)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int[] testLabelArray,

                             throws java.lang.Exception

        This method tests and evaluates the classifier.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        testLabelArray - int[] representing the separate test data label array.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int[] testLabelArray,
                           int numClasses,
                           float[][] pointDistances,
                           int[][] pointNeighbors)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        testLabelArray - int[] representing the separate test data label array.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        pointNeighbors - int[][] representing and array of arrays of k-nearest neighbor indexes for the test data points among the training data, for kNN-based classification methods.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        This method tests and evaluates the classifier, while keeping track of correct classifications for each class.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        correctPointClassificationArray - float[] representing the counter of correct class-specific classifications, for latter analysis.
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        pointNeighbors - int[][] representing and array of arrays of k-nearest neighbor indexes for the test data points among the training data, for kNN-based classification methods.

        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(float[][] predictedProbLabelsAllData,
                           float[] correctPointClassificationArray,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int numClasses,
                           float[][] pointDistances)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier, while keeping track of correct classifications for each class.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        predictedProbLabelsAllData - float[][] representing the current predicted fuzzy labels for all data points (not only the test points in the current iteration, but rather all points from the original data.)
        correctPointClassificationArray - float[] representing the counter of correct class-specific classifications, for latter analysis.
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(float[][] predictedProbLabelsAllData,
                           float[] correctPointClassificationArray,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int[] testLabelArray,
                           int numClasses,
                           float[][] pointDistances)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier, while keeping track of correct classifications for each class.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        predictedProbLabelsAllData - float[][] representing the current predicted fuzzy labels for all data points (not only the test points in the current iteration, but rather all points from the original data.)
        correctPointClassificationArray - float[] representing the counter of correct class-specific classifications, for latter analysis.
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        testLabelArray - int[] representing the separate test data label array.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(float[][] predictedProbLabelsAllData,
                           float[] correctPointClassificationArray,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes,
                           java.lang.Object dataType,
                           int numClasses,
                           float[][] pointDistances,
                           int[][] pointNeighbors)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ValidateableInterface
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier, while keeping track of correct classifications for each class.
        Specified by:
        test in interface ValidateableInterface
        Parameters:
        predictedProbLabelsAllData - float[][] representing the current predicted fuzzy labels for all data points (not only the test points in the current iteration, but rather all points from the original data.)
        correctPointClassificationArray - float[] representing the counter of correct class-specific classifications, for latter analysis.
        indexes - ArrayList of test data indexes.
        dataType - Object that is the test data context. It can correspond to dense and sparse DataSet objects, as well as a DiscretizedDataSet data context.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        pointDistances - float[][] representing a matrix of distances from the training points to the test points.
        pointNeighbors - int[][] representing and array of arrays of k-nearest neighbor indexes for the test data points among the training data, for kNN-based classification methods.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • test

        public ClassificationEstimator test(float[][] predictedProbLabelsAllData,
                           float[] correctPointClassificationArray,
                           Category[] dataClasses)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method tests and evaluates the classifier.
        Parameters:
        predictedProbLabelsAllData - float[][] representing the current predicted fuzzy labels for all data points (not only the test points in the current iteration, but rather all points from the original data.)
        correctPointClassificationArray - float[] that is updated with the total point-wise classification precision.
        dataClasses - Array of data categories representing the test data.
        Returns:
        ClassificationEstimator containing the resulting classification quality measures.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
